sentences.sentence: Objective To investigate the effect of allogeneic bone nail on fracture dislocations of hip joint.
sentences.translation: 目的探讨同种异体骨钉治疗髋关节骨折脱位的疗效。

sentences.sentence: In many centers, cultured epidermal grafts, both autologous and allogeneic, are being used, with promising results.
sentences.translation: 在很多中心，使用培养的自体或异体表皮移植物取得了大有希望的效果。

sentences.sentence: This article will analysis allogeneic word of Xiao Zhuan based on the broad definition of the allogeneic word and quantitative analysis method.
sentences.translation: 文章将依据广义异体字的界定，采取定量分析的方法，对《说文》中的小篆异体字进行初步研究。
